Name: maximize_skill_match_on_tasks
Description: Assign tasks to workers who possess the necessary skills at an adequate level.

Name: minimize_worker_overload
Description: Ensure that the total effort of tasks assigned to a worker does not exceed their availability.

Name: maximize_team_size_adherence
Description: Ensure that the team size stays within the ideal Scrum range (e.g., 3-9 members).

Name: minimize_work_on_low_priority_stories
Description: Avoid working on tasks that belong to low-priority user stories.

Name: maximize_use_of_certified_skills
Description: Prefer assigning tasks to workers who have a certified skill when applicable.

Name: minimize_tasks_without_user_story
Description: Ensure every task is linked to a parent user story.

Name: maximize_work_for_active_workers
Description: Only assign work to workers whose status is 'active'.

Name: maximize_clarity_of_acceptance_criteria
Description: Prioritize User Stories that have well-defined acceptance criteria.

Name: minimize_sprint_disruption
Description: Avoid adding new tasks to a sprint backlog once the sprint has started.

Name: maximize_feature_documentation_linkage
Description: Ensure every completed feature has corresponding documentation.

Name: minimize_assignment_to_unavailable_teams
Description: Do not assign new sprints or features to teams with a status of 'inactive' or 'disbanded'.
